short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to control YouTube video speed with custom hotkeys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On certain non English keyboard the Shift+< and Shift+> doesn't work. With this extension you can set different keys to control playback speed.
